testcase.name: Get state code test on weather API
testcase.system-out: Given user provides key a0f75544b9da4790a507dfb05e174f7e lat 40.730610 lon -73.935242 as parameters.passed When user invokes state code service as GET.................................passed Then verify status code is 200..............................................passed Then print the state code from response.....................................passed
